Title: Establishes an alternative resolution program for service members and veterans accused of certain felonies
Summary: Establishes an alternative resolution program for service members and veterans accused of certain felonies.
LawCode: Add Title I Art 217 §§217.00 - 217.10, amd §390.30, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to establishing an alternative resolution program for service members and veterans accused of certain felonies
